component.name: soapLogout
component.description: Ends the current Salesforce SOAP session.

component.name: soapQuery
component.description: Executes a SOQL query to fetch records.

component.name: soapQueryAll
component.description: Runs a SOQL query including archived and deleted records.

component.name: soapQueryMore
component.description: Retrieves the next batch of SOQL query results.

component.name: soapCreate
component.description: Inserts new SObject records via SOAP.

component.name: soapUpdate
component.description: Updates existing SObject records via SOAP.

component.name: soapUpsert
component.description: Inserts or updates SObject records based on an external ID.

component.name: soapDelete
component.description: Removes SObject records via SOAP.

component.name: soapSearch
component.description: Performs a SOSL search across multiple objects.

component.name: soapEmptyRecycleBin
component.description: Permanently deletes all items in the Recycle Bin.

component.name: soapUndelete
component.description: Restores records from the Recycle Bin.

component.name: soapDescribeSObject
component.description: Retrieves metadata for a single SObject type.

component.name: soapDescribeSObjects
component.description: Retrieves metadata for multiple SObject types.

component.name: soapDescribeGlobal
component.description: Lists all available SObject types in the org.

component.name: soapSetPassword
component.description: Sets a new password for a specified user.

component.name: soapSendEmailMessage
component.description: Sends an email with attachments via SOAP.

component.name: soapSendEmail
component.description: Sends a basic email notification via SOAP.

component.name: soapRetrieve
component.description: Fetches specified fields of SObject records by ID.

component.name: soapResetPassword
component.description: Generates and returns a new temporary password for a user.

component.name: soapGetUserInfo
component.description: Fetches details about the current user.

component.name: soapGetDeleted
component.description: Lists records deleted within a given time frame.

component.name: soapGetUpdated
component.description: Lists records updated within a given time frame.

component.name: soapGetServerTimestamp
component.description: Retrieves the current Salesforce server timestamp.

component.name: soapFindDuplicates
component.description: Searches for duplicate records based on duplicate rules.

component.name: soapFindDuplicatesByIds
component.description: Finds duplicates by comparing given record IDs.

component.name: soapMerge
component.description: Merges multiple duplicate records into one.

component.name: soapConvertLead
component.description: Converts Lead records into Account/Contact (and optionally Opportunity).
